Package src

Class Book

java.lang.Object
src.Book
public class Book
extends java.lang.Object
Represents a book in the library. This class defines the abstract data type Book, which encapsulates the data fields and methods of a book.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Book()
    Default Book constructor - creates an empty Book
    Book​(java.lang.String number)
    Creates a book with specified number and blank name and date.
    Book​(java.lang.String number, java.lang.String name, Date datePublished)
    Creates a book with the specified number, name, and publishing date
    Book​(java.lang.String name, Date datePublished)
    Creates a book with specified name and date and a blank number.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean equals​(java.lang.Object obj)
    Compares an object to the book to check for equality.
    boolean getCheckedOutStatus()
    Gets the checked out status of the book.
    Date getDate()
    Gets the date a book was published.
    java.lang.String getNumber()
    Gets the book's serial number.
    void setCheckedOutStatus​(boolean checkedOut)
    Sets the checked out status of the book.
    void setNumber​(java.lang.String number)
    Sets the book's serial number.
    java.lang.String toString()
    Represents a Book object and its attributes as a string.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Book

      public Book​(java.lang.String number, java.lang.String name, Date datePublished)
      Creates a book with the specified number, name, and publishing date
      Parameters:
      number - A String representing serial number of the book
      name - A String representing the name of the book
      datePublished - A Date object of the date the book was published.

      Parameters:
      name - A String representing the name of the book.
      datePublished - A Date object of the date the book was published.

    • equals

      public boolean equals​(java.lang.Object obj)
      Compares an object to the book to check for equality.
      Overrides:
      equals in class java.lang.Object
      Parameters:
      obj - an object to compare to the book.
      Returns:
      true if the serial number of the input obj matches the book's number.
